marker.ph: <<ContentPage.BindingContext> <vm:ListViewModel></vm:ListViewModel> </ContentPage.BindingContext> <StackLayout Padding="5"> <ListView x:Name="listViewSeries" ItemsSource="{Binding Series}" ItemTapped="Handle_ItemTapped"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" VerticalOptions="CenterAndExpand" HeightRequest="40" WidthRequest="40" Source="{ Binding Image}" /> <Label Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0" VerticalOptions="CenterAndExpand" Text="{Binding Nome}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView> </StackLayout>.../>

<<ListView x:Name="listViewSeries" ItemsSource="{Binding Series}" ItemTapped="Handle_ItemTapped"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Image Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" VerticalOptions="CenterAndExpand" HeightRequest="40" WidthRequest="40" Source="{ Binding Image}" /> <Label Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="0" VerticalOptions="CenterAndExpand" Text="{Binding Nome}" /> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView>.../>

<<ContentPage.Content>
<StackLayout Padding="25" BackgroundColor="Black">
<Image Grid.Column="0" Grid.Row="0" VerticalOptions="CenterAndExpand" HeightRequest="200" WidthRequest="200" Source="{ Binding Filme.Image}" />
<Label Text="{Binding Filme.Sinopse}" TextColor="White" Height="200"/>
</StackLayout>
</ContentPage.Content>.../>
